result.eng: Could you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.
result.ga: An bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil Tá an líne ag briseadh
result.orig: An bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil Tá an líne ag briseadh
result.html: An bhféadfá labhairt níos airde le do thoil Tá an líne ag briseadhCould you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.
result.ponchtml: An ḃféadfá laḃairt níos airde le do ṫoil Tá an líne ag briseaḋCould you speak louder, please. The line is breaking up.

result.ga: Bhí an gol ag briseadh uirthi
result.orig: Bhí an gol ag briseadh uirthi
result.html: Bhí an gol ag briseadh uirthiShe was breaking into tears.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an gol ag briseaḋ uirṫiShe was breaking into tears.
